page.title: 18A Sedlescombe girl's hobbies
page.content: I do Modern Dancing which is like ballet but looser. I also do Tap in which you wear special shoes to tap a rhythm as you dance. Brownies is a kind of club for girls and we have brown uniforms. We talk about things and play games. We go on Brownie Pack holidays and present shows. Stoolball is a sport in which you have to hit a ball and get runs for your team whilst the other side tries to prevent this. I play two musical instruments. The recorder is a wind instrument. It is great fun playing the piano. I am on Grade Three and have to play scales. I like riding my bike very fast up and down our lane because there is no traffic along it.
